task_log: Test (2024-03-11 08:16:31.335354): 'The essence of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.' - Marcellus V. Elden

Agent (2024-03-11 08:16:34.241865): That's a profound quote by Marcellus V. Elden. It beautifully captures the idea that true discovery and growth come from changing our perspective and seeing the world with fresh eyes, rather than simply seeking out new physical surroundings. It reminds us of the importance of openness, curiosity, and a willingness to see things from different angles in order to truly explore and understand the world around us.
